extends java.lang.Object
implements ObserverController

    void activateLeader​(java.lang.String mex, java.lang.String nickname)

    Adds to currPlayer a ResourceContainer in a specific depositSlotID after checking that everything goes right.
    void addSetUpContainerToPlayer​(int currPlayerNum, ResourceContainer container, int depositSlotID, java.lang.String currNickname)
    Checks if the current player can add a container to his deposit and notifies the Client by sending specific messages thru the Virtual View
    CurrPlayerNum is used to do different actions following the game rules, if a player has the right to select bonus resources
    "addContainerToPlayer" method is called.
    private void askForResources()
    Used for sending messages about the gameSetUpPhase to every player
    void beginMarketDestinationSelection​(java.lang.String senderNick)
    Filters the marketOutput and tells the user that now he can select the destinations
    private void buyDevelopmentCard​(java.lang.String senderNick)
    Used to actually buy the Development Card but only after checking with the method 'canBuy()' if you can do it.
    private boolean checkBuy​(java.lang.String mex, Player currPlayer)
    Checks if the user has enough resources in total to buy the selected DevelopmentCard
    boolean checkIfAllLeadersHaveBeenDiscarded()
    Check if every player in game has already discarded 2 LeaderCards
    private void checkQuestionMarks​(java.lang.String mex, java.lang.String senderNick)
    Checks if the selected Production Slot are valid and if at least one of the Production Slots has QM to fill,
    the currentPlayer PlayerStatus is set to 'SELECTING_QM' otherwise is set to 'SELECTING_PRODUCTION_RESOURCES'
    void discardLeader​(java.lang.String mex, java.lang.String senderNick)
    Called when the player wants to discard a Leader Card in his hand.

    This method is used to discard a specific leader but only after checking that the player trying to do so meets all the criteria.

    Used for selecting the ResourceTypes to put in the QMs The first ResourceTypes Selected are put in QMI, then when QMI is full, the left over ResourceTypes are put in QMO.

    if the removing of the container goes right.

      Parameters:

      private void setUp_Commands​(java.lang.String mex, java.lang.String senderNick, Command command)
      This function manages all the commands that can be sent during the set-up phase
      Parameters:
      mex - is the message received
      senderNick - is the player that sent the message
      command - is the command that the user typed

    • turnPhase_Commands

      private void turnPhase_Commands​(java.lang.String mex, java.lang.String senderNick, Command command)

      Parameters:
      mex - is the message received
      senderNick - is the player that sent the message

    • isTheCurrentPlayer

      public boolean isTheCurrentPlayer​(java.lang.String nick)
      Checks if "nick" is the current player

    • discardLeaderSetUpPhase

      public void discardLeaderSetUpPhase​(java.lang.String mex, java.lang.String senderNick, int playerNumber)
      This method is used to discard a specific leader but only after checking that the player trying to do so meets all the criteria. When every leader has been discarded calls 'askForResources()' method. This method also notifies the view on what happens using specific messages
      Parameters:
      mex - message received
      senderNick - current player nickname
      playerNumber - player number

    • checkIfAllLeadersHaveBeenDiscarded

      public boolean checkIfAllLeadersHaveBeenDiscarded()
      Check if every player in game has already discarded 2 LeaderCards

    • askForResources

      private void askForResources()
      Used for sending messages about the gameSetUpPhase to every player

    • addSetUpContainerToPlayer

      public void addSetUpContainerToPlayer​(int currPlayerNum, ResourceContainer container, int depositSlotID, java.lang.String currNickname)
      Checks if the current player can add a container to his deposit and notifies the Client by sending specific messages thru the Virtual View
      CurrPlayerNum is used to do different actions following the game rules, if a player has the right to select bonus resources
      "addContainerToPlayer" method is called.
      If every player in game is ready (meaning that they already did their set up actions) the game is actually started by calling "startGame" method
      Parameters:
      currPlayerNum - current player number
      container - container to add
      depositSlotID - id of the deposit slot
      currNickname - player's nickname

    • addContainerToPlayer

      public boolean addContainerToPlayer​(int currPlayerNum, ResourceContainer container, int depositSlotID, java.lang.String currNickname)
      Adds to currPlayer a ResourceContainer in a specific depositSlotID after checking that everything goes right. This method also notifies the Client by sending specific messages thru the Virtual View
      Parameters:
      currPlayerNum - current player number
      container - container to add
      depositSlotID - id of the deposit slot
      currNickname - player's nickname
      Returns:
      true if everything goes right, false if an exception is caught

    • startGame

      private void startGame()
      Starts the turn phase

    • mainActionHandler

      public boolean mainActionHandler​(java.lang.String senderNick)
      Used for checking if the player can do his main action.
      Parameters:
      senderNick - currPLayer nick
      Returns:
      true if the player can do his main action, false if he already did it

    • checkBuy

      private boolean checkBuy​(java.lang.String mex, Player currPlayer)
      Checks if the user has enough resources in total to buy the selected DevelopmentCard
      Parameters:
      mex - message received
      currPlayer - current player
      Returns:
      true if he has selected a valid number for the row and column

    • selectResources

      private void selectResources​(java.lang.String mex, java.lang.String senderNick, Command command)
      When the player is in 'PlayerStatus.SELECTING_BUY_RESOURCES' or 'PlayerStatus.PlayerStatus.SELECTING_PRODUCTION_RESOURCES' the method is used to receive the resources selected and checking
      if the removing of the container goes right. When the command 'DONE' is received calls 'buyDevelopmentCard()' or 'produce()' method
      Parameters:
      mex - message received
      senderNick - current player nickname
      command - command received

    • removeContainer

      private boolean removeContainer​(ResourceContainer resourceContainer, java.lang.String destination, int destinationID, java.lang.String senderNick)
      Checks if the curr player owns enough resources to remove 'resourceContainer'. Then if the 'destination' is: - 'VAULT', vault's buffer gets filled - 'DEPOSIT', the specific deposit id's buffer gets filled This method also notifies the view on what happens using specific messages
      Parameters:
      resourceContainer - the container that i want to remove (use as a payment)
      destination - 'deposit' or 'vault'
      destinationID - the
      senderNick - current player nickname
      Returns:
      true if the container is correctly removed, false otherwise

    • buyDevelopmentCard

      private void buyDevelopmentCard​(java.lang.String senderNick)
      Used to actually buy the Development Card but only after checking with the method 'canBuy()' if you can do it. If the card is correctly bought it is inserted in a specific 'productionSlotId' and removed from the card grid This method also notifies the view on what happens using specific messages
      Parameters:
      senderNick - current player nickname

    • checkQuestionMarks

      private void checkQuestionMarks​(java.lang.String mex, java.lang.String senderNick)
      Checks if the selected Production Slot are valid and if at least one of the Production Slots has QM to fill,
      the currentPlayer PlayerStatus is set to 'SELECTING_QM' otherwise is set to 'SELECTING_PRODUCTION_RESOURCES'

    • selectQM

      private void selectQM​(java.lang.String mex, java.lang.String senderNick, Command command)
      Used for selecting the ResourceTypes to put in the QMs The first ResourceTypes Selected are put in QMI, then when QMI is full, the left over ResourceTypes are put in QMO. When every QM of every ProductionSlot is selected the method setUpProduction() is called
      Parameters:
      mex - message received
      senderNick - current player nickname
      command - command received

    • setUpProduction

      private void setUpProduction​(java.lang.String senderNick)
      This method fills the buffers and checks if the currPlayer has enough resources altogether to activate the selected ProductionSlots. If everything goes right currPlayer PlayerStatus is set to 'SELECTING_PRODUCTION_RESOURCES'
      Parameters:
      senderNick - current player nickname

    • produce

      private void produce​(java.lang.String senderNick)
      Used to actually produce but only after checking with the method 'canProduce()' if you can do it. This method also notifies the view on what happens using specific messages
      Parameters:
      senderNick - current player nickname

    • pickFromMarket

      public void pickFromMarket​(java.lang.String mex, java.lang.String senderNick)
      Manages the user action 'Pick From Market' :
      - Checks if the user selected a valid row/column number
      - Checks if the user has one or more active conversion
      - Sets the playerStatus to SELECTING_DESTINATION_AFTER_MARKET

    • beginMarketDestinationSelection

      public void beginMarketDestinationSelection​(java.lang.String senderNick)
      Filters the marketOutput and tells the user that now he can select the destinations

    • marketAddDepositController

      public void marketAddDepositController​(java.lang.String senderNick)
      Manages the sending of resources to the deposits after taking them from the market

    • selectDestinationAfterMarket

      public void selectDestinationAfterMarket​(java.lang.String mex, java.lang.String senderNick, Command command)
      Checks if the user typed the SEND_DEPOSIT_ID command that contains the infos about the deposit in which he wants to place the resource

    • filterNonAddableResources

      public void filterNonAddableResources()
      Filters all the resources that cannot be added to a deposit and checks if they can increase the player position on the faithpath

    • mustDiscardCheck

      public boolean mustDiscardCheck​(ResourceContainer container, java.lang.String senderNick)
      Checks automatically if the user has no place where to put the resource and force him to discard her if there aren't any
      Returns:
      true if he must discard the current resource on the marketOutput array

    • mustConvert

      public void mustConvert​(java.lang.String mex, Command command, java.lang.String senderNick)
      Called when the current player has more than one conversion available

    • manageDeposit

      public void manageDeposit​(java.lang.String mex, java.lang.String senderNick, Command commandType)
      This method is used for both 'MANAGE_DEPOSIT' and 'SWITCH_DEPOSIT' commands. Executes the selected command after checking that the currPlayer can do it.
      Parameters:
      mex - message received containing all the info
      senderNick - currPlayer nickname
      commandType - 'Command.MANAGE_DEPOSIT' or 'Command.SWITCH_DEPOSIT'

    • activateLeader

      public void activateLeader​(java.lang.String mex, java.lang.String nickname)
      Called when the player wants to activate a Leader Card in his hand. If the player meets the criteria to activate the selected card, the leader is correctly activated. Otherwise the view gets notified with specific error messages
      Parameters:
      mex - message received, containing info about the Leader to activate
      nickname - currPlayer nickname

    • discardLeader

      public void discardLeader​(java.lang.String mex, java.lang.String senderNick)
      Called when the player wants to discard a Leader Card in his hand. If the player meets the criteria to discard the selected card, the leader is correctly discarded and the player's position incremented. Otherwise the view gets notified with specific error messages
      Parameters:
      mex - message received, containing info about the Leader to discard
      senderNick - currPlayer nickname

    • incPosOfCurrentPlayer

      public void incPosOfCurrentPlayer​(int qty)

    • incPosOfOthers

      public void incPosOfOthers​(int qty)

    • getView

      public View getView()

    • getGame

      public Game getGame()
